          <title>
            <string language="et">Muusika</string>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Música</string>
          </title>
          <language>et</language>
          <description>
            <string language="et">Õppematerjal mõiste</string>
            <string language="en">PowerPoint study material about music and its expression  means. The material helps students to get new knowledge with the help of pictures and texts.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="et">Alusharidus</string>
            <string language="et">Muusika</string>
            <string language="et">Muusikaline kasvatus</string>
            <string language="en">Basic Education</string>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PowerPoint Studie Material über Musik und seine 
Ausdruck Mittel. Das Material hilft Kursteilnehmern, 
Neuerkenntnis mit Hilfe der Abbildungen und der Texte zu erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériel d'étude de PowerPoint au sujet de la 
musique et de ses moyens d'expression. Le matériel aide des 
étudiants à obtenir de nouvelles connaissances avec l'aide des 
images et des textes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Material do estudo de PowerPoint sobre a música 
e os seus meios da expressão. O material ajuda a estudantes 
começar o conhecimento novo com a ajuda dos retratos e dos textos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiale di studio del PowerPoint circa musica 
ed i relativi mezzi di espressione. Il materiale aiuta gli 
allievi ad ottenere la conoscenza nuova con l'aiuto delle immagini e 
dei testi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PowerPoint υλικό μελέτης για τη μουσική και τα 
μέσα έκφρασής του. Το υλικό βοηθά τους σπουδαστές για να 
πάρει τη νέα γνώση με τη βοήθεια των εικόνων και των κειμένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Material del estudio de PowerPoint sobre música y
sus medios de la expresión. El material ayuda a estudiantes a 
conseguir nuevo conocimiento con la ayuda de cuadros y de textos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundlegende Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Básica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
